item.title: Overview
item.description: Muleza Mwiimbu and Company is a premier law firm providing a comprehensive range of legal services and solutions for domestic and international clients. The firm has a reputation for competence in the following; Property & Conveyance Employment Law Wills and Probate, Matrimonial Causes Securities and Banking Litigation (Commercial, Civil and Criminal) Debt Collection Taxation Company incorporation and Advisory services Alternative dispute resolution Mining agreements Banking and Finance The firm was formed in the month of November, 2012 upon merging with Muleza and Company a firm which was established in March 1993, and currently the Firm comprises of five (5) Lawyers and Learner Legal Practitioners.
“It may be true that the law can not change the heart but it can restrain the heartless” Martin Luther King Jr.
